io.codecastle.scriptorium.json

Class Json

  • Object
    • Json

  • public final class Json
extends Object
    Factory methods for creating new JSON documents and JSON document fragments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JsonArrayDocument array(Appendable appendable)
      Returns a JsonArrayDocument representing the top-level JSON array of a JSON document fragment.
      static JsonArrayDocument array(JsonScribe scribe)
      Returns a JsonArrayDocument representing the top-level JSON array of a JSON document fragment.
      static JsonObjectDocument object(Appendable appendable)
      Returns a JsonObjectDocument representing the top-level JSON object of a JSON document.
      static JsonObjectDocument object(JsonScribe scribe)
      Returns a JsonObjectDocument representing the top-level JSON object of a JSON document.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • object

        public static JsonObjectDocument object(Appendable appendable)
                                 throws IOException
        Returns a JsonObjectDocument representing the top-level JSON object of a JSON document.

        When this method returns, an opening brace will already have been appended to the provided Appendable.

        The JsonObjectDocument returned by this method will use a FastJsonScribe.

        Parameters:
        appendable - an Appendable to output the JSON document to
        Returns:
        a JsonObjectDocument representing the top-level JSON object of a JSON document
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if appendable is null

      • object

        public static JsonObjectDocument object(JsonScribe scribe)
                                 throws IOException
        Returns a JsonObjectDocument representing the top-level JSON object of a JSON document.

        When this method returns, the provided scribe's JsonScribe.pushObject() method will already have been called.

        Parameters:
        scribe - the JsonScribe to use to output the JSON document
        Returns:
        a JsonObjectDocument representing the top-level JSON object of a JSON document
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if scribe is null

      • array

        public static JsonArrayDocument array(Appendable appendable)
                               throws IOException
        Returns a JsonArrayDocument representing the top-level JSON array of a JSON document fragment.

        When this method returns, an opening bracket will already have been appended to the provided Appendable.

        The JsonArrayDocument returned by this method will use a FastJsonScribe.

        Parameters:
        appendable - an Appendable to output the JSON document to
        Returns:
        a JsonArrayDocument representing the top-level JSON array of a JSON document fragment
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if appendable is null

      • array

        public static JsonArrayDocument array(JsonScribe scribe)
                               throws IOException
        Returns a JsonArrayDocument representing the top-level JSON array of a JSON document fragment.

        When this method returns, the provided scribe's JsonScribe.pushArray() method will already have been called.

        Parameters:
        scribe - the JsonScribe to use to output the JSON document fragment
        Returns:
        a JsonArrayDocument representing the top-level JSON array of a JSON document fragment
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if appendable is null
